problem_names:
lemma weakly_logically_equivalent_eqvt:
    assumes "P \<equiv>\<cdot> Q" shows "p \<bullet> P \<equiv>\<cdot> p \<bullet> Q"
translations:
lemma weakly_logically_equivalent_eqvt:
    assumes "P \<equiv>\<cdot> Q" shows "p \<bullet> P \<equiv>\<cdot> p \<bullet> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> P \<equiv>\<cdot> p \<bullet> Q

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x.
       weak_formula x \<longrightarrow>
       p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       weak_formula x \<Longrightarrow>
       p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       weak_formula x \<Longrightarrow>
       p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x

proof (state)
this:
  weak_formula x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       weak_formula x \<Longrightarrow>
       p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x

proof (prove)
using this:
  weak_formula x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. weak_formula (- p \<bullet> x)

proof (state)
this:
  weak_formula (- p \<bullet> x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       weak_formula x \<Longrightarrow>
       p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x

proof (chain)
picking this:
  weak_formula (- p \<bullet> x)
show "p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x \<longleftrightarrow> p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x"

proof (prove)
using this:
  weak_formula (- p \<bullet> x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x

proof (prove)
using this:
  weak_formula (- p \<bullet> x)
  P \<equiv>\<cdot> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x

proof (state)
this:
  p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x

goal:
No subgoals!
